sentences.sContent: Note the series of numbered files on the left.
sentences.sCn: 注意，在左边是一系列数字编号的文件。

sentences.sContent: If you think you are on the left, then you really are.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you think you are on the left, then you really are.
sentences.sCn: 假如你认为自己在左边，那么你就是在左边。 明白了？

sentences.sContent: After each link, it inserts a  element, so there will be one link per line on the left side.
sentences.sContent_eng: After each link, it inserts a element, so there will be one link per line on the left side.
sentences.sCn: 在每个链接之后，它插入一个  元素，以便在左边，每行只有一个链接。
